lore: Due to their inability to communicate verbally with the creatures on the surface, Revenants began to use their hands to communicate through gestures. In time, they created a sign language that is now common throughout the world.\n\nRevenant Sealords are expert magic users who are in charge of teaching its mysteries to the next generations. However, their strength is comparable to a warrior's, as they use their arcane knowledge to amplify the power of their staves.
menagerieDialog: It's a common misconception that all Revenants like to fight. I, for one, would prefer to lead a quiet life and dedicate myself to collecting minerals.
What's wrong? You look like a fish out of water.\n\nHA!
(Revenants hate when you call them "fish people". Never make that mistake.)
I am not a fish. I am NOT. A FISH.\n\n(This is the most sensitive fish you've ever met.)
(It smells like dead fish. Probably because that's exactly what it is.)
name: Revenant Sealord
